block.p: Carolyn Ann Elsinger and Jonathan James Kuhe were married yesterday at the Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church in New York. The Rev. Dr. Robert J. Duncan Sr., a United Methodist minister, performed the Presbyterian ceremony.
Mrs. Kuhe, 32, is a district sales manager for Forest Pharmaceuticals in New York. She graduated from Denison University. She is a daughter of Judith L. Elsinger and Carl R. Elsinger of Wyckoff, N.J.
The couple were married Satuday at the Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church in New York, where the Rev. Dr. Robert J. Duncan Sr., a United Methodist minister, performed the Presbyterian ceremony.

Carolyn Ann Elsinger and Jonathan James Kuhe were married yesterday at the Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church in New York. The Rev. Dr. Robert J. Duncan Sr., a United Methodist minister, performed the Presbyterian ceremony.
Mrs. Kuhe, 32, is a district sales manager for Forest Pharmaceuticals in New York. She graduated from Denison University. She is a daughter of Judith L. Elsinger and Carl R. Elsinger of Wyckoff, N.J.

Mr. Kuhe, 36, works in New York as a vice president for sales of mortgaged-backed securities for HSBC. He graduated from Hamilton College. He is a son of Rachel Kuhe of West Hartford, Conn., and the late H. James Kuhe.
